feed.title: Category: Food Salad Bell-Pepper Arugula Quinoa Turkey | Eric's thoughts

entry.title: Robust
entry.content:
This one definitely had me working a lot on the prep and cooking. Total time from start to finish was about an hour. Cook everything for the bell peppers, then eat the bomb-diggity-bomb salad (I just used store bought dressing).

Once you've finished that, take a breather and eat those bell peppers.

Finish up with your favorite milk chocolate.

Smoky Arugula & Fig Salad
Turkey and Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers
